Name: LambdaWars
Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install LambdaWars and run it.

ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!

STEAM CREDENTIALS: For this container you have to provide valid Steam credentials where SteamGuard is disabled and this user need to have the game in it's library (since this game is free you can simply add it to this account).
It is recommended to create a dedicated Steam account for dedicated servers so that account theft of your personal account is impossible.

You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!

UDP1.Name: UDP1
UDP1.Description: UDP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '740 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

GAME_NAME.Name: GAME_NAME
GAME_NAME.Description: Game name to start (is connected to the GAME_PARAMS).

GAME_PARAMS.Name: GAME_PARAMS
GAME_PARAMS.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).
